column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Close to the center of the city, the subway and the Central, Shuman and Luxembourg railway station. The staff was very friendly
column4: It is not specified that the accommodation has rooms on semi-basement, the price being the same regardless of the floor. I get such a room with relatively high humidity for 5 days of accommodation. Carpet on the floor does not help against mold. The windows had only a simple opening system. Good luck we use the camera just for sleep; bad luck that after a day with the closed window, in the evening was a pretty unpleasant smell in the room.

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: I've really liked the hotel's location: it's very close to the city center and the old town. In 5 mins walk you can easily get to the Royal Palace and the park. Metro station Trone is in 100m distance from the hotel entrance.
column4: I didn't like that the cleaning service wasn't included in the whole payment of staying. We needed to pay extra if we needed to clean the room.
